column4: hey guys. I salvaged an older comp. Its 1.5 with now 700 megs of ram and a 256 meg ati gfx card. Thing is ... it runs soooo sluggish ! What can I do? Why do you think my system is laggy ?
Thats what I though. Even KDE runs better then gnome on this
yeah, what doleyb said or try disabling effects
